description:
Near or far, these binoculars help bring everything into focus. They stow easily in a small pack or bag ready for scoping routes or admiring wildlife. The exit pupil of 3.1mm means this binocular will work best under fairly bright conditions, and 11mm eye relief is just enough to permit use with eyeglasses.

  • Durable rubber-armor coating with weather-resistant housing
  • Fold down eyecups work with or without eyewear
  • Anti-reflection, fully-coated optics offer true-to-life images
  • BaK-7 prism glass for bright, clear, crisp viewing
  • Reverse porro prism design provides excellent depth perception and clarity
  • Includes soft carrying case and neck strap
name: Tasco 8-24x25 Binoculars
